contactTitle: Where will your journey lead us

links.title: Your  first Design Sprint: do these 3 things first
In 5 days from sketch to tested prototype with Design Sprints

homeTextIntro: We are Hike One, your favourite digital design agency. Ready to guide you on your hikes to new and better digital products.
homeTextStepTwo: Because innovation is a journey through unmapped terrain, a hike will take you further than a fixed strategy that might get broken on the first obstacle. Every hike is unique, that is the beauty of it. See for yourself.
homeTextStepThree: Innovation is what happens, while you are busy writing mission statements. Here’s what’s happening at Hike One:
